titles: The Christians advantage both by life and death discovered in a sermon preached at the funeral of that faithful and eminent servant of the Lord, Joseph Jackson, late Esq. and alderman of the city of Bristol, on the 17th day of January, an. Dom. 1661, by Fran. Roberts ...
author: Roberts, Francis, 1609-1675.
notes: Imperfect: print show-through with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
